reviews.review: Отличная игра, короткая, но очень хорошая. Головоломки не так сложны и в то же время заставляют подумать, механики с порталганом интуитивны и постепенно очень хорошо усваиваются. Ну и сюжет, уместившийся в мое 3-ех часовое прохождение заставил меня испытать, на удивление, достаточно сильные эмоции. Однозначно в список любимых игр!

An absolute classic! if you can get it cheaply I would recommend it to everyone. 
The graphics are no longer the best, but have aged well. 
In terms of gameplay, it's absolutely great.

Portal is an awesome game for everyone to try at least once in their life. I already had it on another platform but as i hadn't played in a while, i decided to purchase it on here too. Its a great puzzle/challenge game which is not hard but it will get them brain cogs turning on occasion. GG.

" The most interesting games start with a mystery. 
You are in the middle of the puzzle as the main character and the more you go forward, the more interesting and imaginative it becomes. Such is this game, Portal. Built on the Half Life platform, this game brings new rules of physics and science, a weapon that opens up many fields and the mind itself. As you break the laws of physics, space and time by moving in a limited parameter, you realize that the so-called simple tests are not just so simple at first glance. I have enjoyed this game for a very long time, and now via Steam and some time off (finally) I have a chance to continue my enjoyment in sequel, Portal 2." - [ǤƎŊǤ]

To be fair, you have to have a very high IQ to understand Rick and Morty. The humour is extremely subtle, and without a solid grasp of theoretical physics most of the jokes will go over a typical viewer's head. There's also Rick's nihilistic outlook, which is deftly woven into his characterisation- his personal philosophy draws heavily from Narodnaya Volya literature, for instance. The fans understand this stuff; they have the intellectual capacity to truly appreciate the depths of these jokes, to realise that they're not just funny- they say something deep about LIFE. As a consequence people who dislike Rick & Morty truly ARE idiots- of course they wouldn't appreciate, for instance, the humour in Rick's existential catchphrase "Wubba Lubba Dub Dub," which itself is a cryptic reference to Turgenev's Russian epic Fathers and Sons. I'm smirking right now just imagining one of those addlepated simpletons scratching their heads in confusion as Dan Harmon's genius wit unfolds itself on their television screens. What fools.. how I pity them. 😂

And yes, by the way, i DO have a Rick & Morty tattoo. And no, you cannot see it. It's for the ladies' eyes only- and even then they have to demonstrate that they're within 5 IQ points of my own (preferably lower) beforehand. Nothin personnel kid 😎

是个好游戏，我自己一个人用了两个小时通关了（那种只靠自己通关的感觉真的让人很有成就感）。这游戏比较考验玩家的逻辑思维能力。从来没晕过3D游戏的我居然第一次被这个游戏搞得有点头晕。游戏结尾的音乐真的蛮不错的。开发者解说模式则让我了解到游戏设计者在设计游戏的时候用心了，这也让玩家有了再一次玩一遍这个游戏的动力。传送门2我准备过几天再玩，好让我好好回味回味1带给我的快乐。
